author: nd
msg: document the brand new DirectorySlash directive

author: randyk
msg: use APR::PerlIO's open, rather than Perl's open, in opening
$upload->tempname. This makes a difference on Win32 - the temporary
file is created with APR_DELONCLOSE to delete the file upon
closing, and if Perl's open() is used, the temp file gets
deleted before open() can read it.

author: joes
msg: Have fh() return a GLOB{IO} ref instead of a raw GLOB for better apreq1 compat.

author: joes
msg: style cleanups: fold code lines over 78 chars

author: nd
msg: that's not really an error condition, so make the message APLOG_DEBUG.
